About Me

I am a Graduate in Physics, working closely with web technologies. My goal today is becoming a web developer and have been working towards it in my spare time for the last year. I am 100% positive I will reach it and I believe it can only be done via hard work and dedication. So far I have concentrated my efforts in learning Javascript web stack.

Some qualities that may, at least I think, make me stand out of the crowd: transparency, extremely fast learner and BS-free attitude.
